name: Immigrate to Pará
description: Pará is a Brazilian state in the North Region, traversed by the Amazon River and home to the Amazon rainforest. Its capital is Belém, and it produces key commodities like açaí, cassava, and iron ore, with major festivals including the Círio de Nazaré.
keywords: Pará, Amazon River, Belém, açaí, rainforest, Círio de Nazaré, iron ore
